  â–“              â–€ â–€ â–€â–€â–€ â–€â–€â–€ â–€â–€â–€ â–€ â–€ â–€â–€â–€ â–€â–€â–€   â–€ â–€ â–€ â–€   â–€â–€â–€              â–“
 
    Deckbuilding comes to life in Hand of Fate! An  infinitely  replayable
    series of quests - earn new cards, build your deck, then try to defeat
    it! Beyond the thirteen gates at the end of  the world,  the  game  of
    life  and  death  is played.  Draw your  cards, play  your  hand,  and
    discover your fate. Hand of Fate is a hybrid roguelike/action-RPG/deck
    builder, in which the player builds a set of cards into a  deck, which
    is  then  used  to deal  out the  dungeon floors  through  which  they
    adventure.
 
 
       For more infos go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/266510/
